algorithm_technique: Iterating through substrings and character hashing
problem_summary_simple: Hash a string by dividing it into k-length parts and summing character values modulo 26.
problem_summary_technical: Process string in k-sized chunks, sum character hash values, take modulo 26, and convert back to char.
key_insights: The problem involves processing the string in fixed-size chunks.
Character to integer mapping (a=0, b=1, ...) is crucial.
The modulo 26 operation ensures the result stays within the alphabet range.
